title: cant disenchant skins or champion :(
body: As title says, i cant do nothing with skins or champs i got in the chests, when i click on the champ or skin in the loot menu i have no options to disenchant them or take them, what to do ? :(

replies.body: Hmmmm strange. So the popup menu won't open up after clicking on a shard? First try closing and reopening your client if you haven't yet, and after that, we could try doing a quick client repair through the client options. Let me know if those don't help!
